title: NInputProps
description: Neuron input component for single-line text entry. Supports multiple input types, validation states, and error messaging.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text displayed when the input is empty.

type.description: HTML input type determining input behavior and keyboard on mobile.

disabled.description: Whether the input is disabled and non-interactive.

invalid.description: Whether the input is in an invalid/error state.

errorMessage.description: Error message displayed below the input when invalid.

onChange.description: Binding key for the change event handler.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
